thread.section_title: Vacatia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vacatia | www.vacatia.com
thread.title: Melinda Price

author: Melinda Price
title: Melinda Price
text:
I booked a 2 bedroom 2 bath condo at Caribe Cove Resort thru Vacatia. Vacatia made it easy to set up my vacation and my family loved it. We had a full kitchen to cook our meals in with a screened balcony for the family to eat on. We really loved the heated pool and jacuzzi. I will definitely use Vacatia in the future and recommend them to others. Thank you, Vacatia!
Melinda P from Homestead, FL
